On 8/20/07, avinash anand <avinash_anand@...> wrote:
>
> Can anyone suggest a good code coverage tool for Java code. Does JUnit has
> testing code coverage capability.
> I have evaluated Agitar but its very costly $50000 for 10 licenses, please
> suggest some opensource or cheaper version of them
>

[disclosure: I work for Agitar]

JUnit Factory is a subset of Agitar's product. It includes code coverage (in
Eclipse, Ant and Maven). It is free.

-- 
Kevin

http://www.junitfactory.com
You send us code. We send you tests. For free.
